client.ClientViews

Class MainView

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientViews.MainView

  • class MainView
extends java.lang.Object
    Order view displays the orders of the shop.
    Since:
    April 5, 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jake Liu, Shamez Meghji, Victor Sanchez
